Package me.dessie.dessielib.storageapi.api

Interface ITaskHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskHandler
public interface ITaskHandler
This class is used for running specific tasks asynchronously and on timers. Whenever something will need one of these cases, it's runnable will be passed to the instance of this class to be executed appropriately.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cancel(Runnable runnable)
    Cancels a task that matches a provided runnable.
    void
    runTaskAsync(Runnable runnable)
    Runs a Runnable asynchronously.
    void
    runTaskLater(Runnable runnable, long delay)
    Runs a Runnable after a specified delay.
    void
    runTaskTimer(Runnable runnable, long delay, long period)
    Runs a Runnable after a specified delay, and repeats it infinitely until cancelled at the specified period.

  • Method Details

    • runTaskAsync

      void runTaskAsync(Runnable runnable)
      Runs a Runnable asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to execute

    • runTaskLater

      void runTaskLater(Runnable runnable, long delay)
      Runs a Runnable after a specified delay.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to execute
      delay - How long to wait, in seconds before the task is executed.

    • runTaskTimer

      void runTaskTimer(Runnable runnable, long delay, long period)
      Runs a Runnable after a specified delay, and repeats it infinitely until cancelled at the specified period.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to execute
      delay - How long to wait, in seconds before the task is executed.
      period - How long to wait between run cycles.

    • cancel

      void cancel(Runnable runnable)
      Cancels a task that matches a provided runnable.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The runnable task to cancel.
